level 1.Description: Public-private partnerships implement SDG7 targets by leveraging the resources and expertise of both the public and private sectors.
Public-private partnerships provide funding for the implementation of SDG7 targets, ensuring financial support for sustainable energy projects.
Public-private partnerships focus on achieving SDG7 targets, which aim to ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable, and modern energy for all.
Public-private partnerships collaborate with SDG7 targets to jointly work towards the goal of sustainable energy for all.
Public-private partnerships contribute to the achievement of SDG7 targets by implementing sustainable energy projects and initiatives.
Public-private partnerships monitor the progress of SDG7 targets to ensure the effective implementation of sustainable energy solutions.
Public-private partnerships address the challenges and barriers hindering the achievement of SDG7 targets, working towards overcoming them.
Public-private partnerships employ various strategies and approaches to achieve SDG7 targets, leveraging their combined resources and expertise.
Public-private partnerships collaborate closely with SDG7 targets to ensure coordinated efforts towards sustainable energy development.

level 2.Subject: SDG7 targets
level 2.Description: SDG7 targets implements energy efficiency policy to promote sustainable energy practices.

level 2.Subject: SDG7 targets
level 2.Description: SDG7 targets funds renewable energy projects to support the transition to sustainable energy sources.

level 3.Subject: energy efficiency
level 3.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

level 3.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 3.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

level 3.Subject: energy poverty indices
level 3.Description: Energy poverty indices implement energy access programs to provide affordable and reliable energy services to underserved communities.

subelement_relations.Description: Joint ventures are a type of public-private partnership where two or more entities collaborate and pool resources to undertake a specific project or achieve a common goal. They involve shared risks, responsibilities, and profits.
Cooperative agreements are a form of public-private partnership where entities work together to achieve a common objective. They involve sharing resources, expertise, and responsibilities.

Concession agreements are contractual arrangements between a public entity and a private entity, granting the private entity the right to operate, maintain, and/or develop a specific infrastructure or service. They involve the transfer of certain rights and responsibilities from the public sector to the private sector.
Strategic alliances are partnerships formed between entities to achieve a specific strategic objective. They involve collaboration, resource sharing, and joint decision-making.

Shared value partnerships are collaborations between public and private entities that aim to create economic value while also addressing social and environmental challenges. They involve aligning business strategies with societal needs.
